Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A great little phone! I have had several of these phones over the last few years, because of the two features I use and have not found on newer phones - It has voice commands without having to subscribe to an extra service and has calendar reminders that I use extensively.

Reviews.Title: A beautiful gift to a friend
Reviews.Author: os1r4f
Reviews.Content: i gave this item to a friend. He cherish it so much that anytime we met he is always thanking me. He said that it works perfectly well under all weather. I will buy the item again for a gift. I WILL RECOMMED to friends.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: bubba
Reviews.Content: Originally got this because it has a loud ringer. Doesn't hold up to well if you work in the trades though. Would only use this phone in an office environment.

Reviews.Title: great phones .
Reviews.Author: james king
Reviews.Content: it was a great phone, i had about 6 of these phones. i loved these phones. wife and i used them till we couldn:t get them any more.

ProductInfo.Features:
Integrated handsfree speaker
Voice dialing and voice commands
Voice recorder
Speed dial and last number redial
Caller ID with photo
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 6102I Tri-Band GSM Mobile Cellphone - Unlocked
